game.name: Door Kickers 2: Task Force North
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Includes level editor, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 중동 기반 테러 조직과의 치열한 전투에서 특수작전부대를 지휘하십시오. RockPaperShotgun에서 "2014년 최고의 전술 게임"으로 선정된 작품의 후속작입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command military Special Ops Teams in gripping tactical combat against a Middle East-based terrorist network. Sequel to RockPaperShotgun's "Best Tactics Game of 2014".

reviewHighlights.text: i played a pirated copy of tis shit for the past like 2 months, racked up like 150 hours and i loved it so uh i brought the game to show my appreciati...
